unpublishedAction.name: slack_automation_approved

actionConfiguration.body: {"text":{{"Hi <!channel> <!subteam^S02FF7AFS1J> <!subteam^S02GWJBFSEB>, Payment details are Edited. Please check & assign ticket for license extension if required, Code is - "+edit_retailer_code.text + " & payment ID is " +payment_id_val.text + ". Payment status is " + edit_payment_status.selectedOptionValue +". Check retailer update for ideal days where current license_days is "+editPayment.data.edit_license_days+" and new ideal days will be "+editPayment.data.current_ideal_days+"."}}}

jsonPathKeys: "Hi <!channel> <!subteam^S02FF7AFS1J> <!subteam^S02GWJBFSEB>, Payment details are Edited.
